name: Healing Springs
description: Summon restoring spirits with your staff, healing you and your allies in the target area for 386 Health and an additional 386 Health every 1 second for 8 seconds.   You restore 30 Magicka every time you or an ally is healed.
effectLines: You restore Magicka for each friendly target healed.
coefDescription: Summon restoring spirits with your staff, healing you and your allies in the target area for $1 Health and an additional $2 Health every 1 second for 8 seconds.   You restore 30 Magicka every time you or an ally is healed.
rawDescription:
Summon restoring spirits with your staff, healing you and your allies in the target area for <<1>> Health and an additional <<1>> Health every <<2>> for <<3>>. 

You restore <<4>> Magicka every time you or an ally is healed.
